alert.note: Alert for Newaygo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:16PM EDT until June 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Newaygo County in west central Michigan... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 515 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near White Cloud, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Newaygo County, including the following locations... Woodville and Wooster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
